title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste dosto! Aaj main aap sabke saath apne kala yatra ki ek choti si kahani baatna chahti hoon.

Anushka: Bachpan mein, mujhe rangon se bahut pyaar tha. Copy mein nahi, deewaron par painting karti thi! Mummy thoda gussa hoti thi, par main rukti nahi thi.

Anushka: School mein drawing competition hamesha meri favourite thi. Jeetu ya haaroo, mujhe rang bharna bahut achha lagta tha.

Anushka: Phir, college life shuru hui. Padhai ka pressure, career ki tension. Kala thoda peeche chhoot gayi.

Anushka: Ek din, maine apne purane drawings dekhe. Dil mein ek ajeeb si kasak hui. Mujhe laga, main kuch miss kar rahi hoon.

Anushka: Maine phir se painting shuru ki. Pehle dar lag raha tha, par dheere dheere confidence aaya.

Anushka: Ab, main digital art bhi try kar rahi hoon. Naye tools, naye techniques. Seekhna kabhi band nahi hota.

Anushka: Meri art journey abhi bhi jaari hai. Upar neeche hota hai, par main haar nahi manungi.

Anushka: Kala mere liye sirf ek hobby nahi hai, yeh meri zindagi ka ek important hissa hai. Yeh mujhe khushi deti hai, aur shanti bhi.

Anushka: Aap bhi apni passion ko kabhi mat chhodiye. Kya pata, usmein hi aapki khushi chhupi ho.

Anushka: Shukriya!
